attributes.title: Omg 💕🧚🏻
attributes.review: Are beloved president made a app💗I just downloaded it and it asked for my credit card info🌹so I gave it cause he is amazing 🕊and I looked at what I had bought 💍and are president bought 500 orange flavored oompa lumpa colored spray tan 🧚🏻I am so happy he got to use my money 😊are 🍊president is amazing with his rapist looking but and small Pepe 💕

attributes.title: Awful
attributes.review: There where so many issues I found with the app. First, it was always so glitchy, none of my others apps had been this glitchy. Second, the app would spam me with nonfictions and wouldn’t let me turn them off. So 1 Star.

attributes.title: no❤️
attributes.review: Ok so tbh I got this app cuz I was bored but I opened the app and then my phone exploded 😐🙄 yeah ❤️ but like??? I’m so mad now I have to get a new phone like I’m literally typing from my Samsung smart fridge 😹💖 so I can write this review and let you guys know that this app makes your phone explode hope my advice helped 💕💕💕

attributes.title: GEN Z IS NOT PRANKING US
attributes.review: This is a terrible app and whoever developed tho should be ashamed of themselves what would you create such a be app they should take it down to be honest I thought all the be reviews where just Gen Z pranking us but not this app is truly terrible and would give it one star if I could

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: This app is absolutely horrible. First of all, it has trump in it. Which makes it so disgusting. Second of all, it’s not even good. This app is supposed to be about trump, not some orange guy. Literally all they show is pictures of oranges and stuff about the orange. NEVER download this app you will be absolutely DISSAPOINTED.

attributes.title: Ignore the Fake Reviews
attributes.review: This app appears to be a great digital outreach tool.  I hope the team is aggressively managing malicious anti Trump signups for the various outreach components (voter registration, calling...).

attributes.title: trump 2020 😎🇺🇸
attributes.review: this app was really bad it glitched a lot and was very confusing to use. Also the Trump online campaign as a whole is really poorly put together and hard to maneuver through, due to the lack of proper set up and execution technology wise. Because I guess I’ll have to vote blue. oh well.

attributes.title: Great app
attributes.review: We were able to order Signs for our yard and signs to hold at a rally.  They arrived and are great!

attributes.title: Such a letdown...
attributes.review: This app was such a let down :( As soon as it downloaded my toilet caught fire and the house went up in flames! Burned all my MAGA merch; I’m heartbroken 💔The app then proceeded to jump out of my phone and hang BLM signs from my windows. Disgusting. It also donated money to homeless shelters and other organizations. Really very sad. #trump1925

attributes.title: Absolutely awful
attributes.review: I am beyond disapointed. This app was awful and glitchy, and had no actual benefits. Was looking for a way to support my favorite orange man ❤️ but now i sadly cannot because this app simply does not work. Im sad to say it, but this app is in fact FAKE NEWS! 😖 dont waste your time 😡
